description.value:
Your eidolon gains an evolution integral to its form, and it comes more easily than your other synergies. You gain one evolution feat from the following list:

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Airborne Form]{Airborne Form}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Burrowing Form]{Burrowing Form}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Ever-Vigilant Senses]{Ever-Vigilant Senses}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Hulking Size]{Hulking Size}

For the purpose of meeting its prerequisites, your summoner level is equal to your character level - 4.
